document_data.name: Worg
document_data.mainbody: The '''Worg language''' was the racial language of [[worg]]s, a species of [[magical beast|magical]] canines with moderate intellect.{{Cite document/Sword Coast Survival Guide|38}}
document_data.Description: The Worg tongue was limited in many respects,{{Cite dungeon/27/Juggernaut|21}} being a primitive language.{{Cite dungeon/27/Juggernaut|21}}
document_data.Speakers: Beyond worgs themselves, their primitive language was known by some fellow intelligent canine species, namely [[barghest]]s and [[winter wolf|winter wolves]].
document_data.Notable Speakers: * [[Holly Harrowslough]], a [[paladin]] of [[Lathander]], could speak Worg to a rudimentary degree.
